# NETWORK::NETWORK_HASH_FROM_PLAYER_HANDLE

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Returns
* **INT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Retrieve a hash for a gamer handle from a player index. In non-network games, this will return the local gamer handle
